医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现位置如何影响免疫细胞对抗疾病的作用人体免疫系统就像一支由特种士兵（免疫细胞）组成的军队，每个士兵在对抗疾病方面都发挥着独特的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Researchers-discover-how-location-affects-immune-cells-role-in-fighting-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Researchers-discover-how-location-affects-immune-cells-role-in-fighting-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61d670ab-f895-4434-86c2-4ab17135d2e4 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 20:00:00 -0500 Researchers discover how location affects immune cells' role in fighting disease
强健的心脏，强健的骨骼：心血管健康如何影响骨密度较高的心血管健康状况（Life's Essential 8 分）与 20-59 岁成年人较高的骨矿物质密度有关，在年轻人、女性和体重指数正常的人中这种关系更明显，这表明心脏健康的习惯可以保护骨骼强度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Strong-heart-strong-bones-How-cardioangio-health-influences-bone-densis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Strong-heart-strong-bones-How-cardioangio-health-influences-bone- Density.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75e8fd3a-443d-4518-959e-a1b350cb58ba Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:56:00 -0500 Strong heart, strong bones: How cardiovascular health influences bone density
新的铜检测工具可能会带来肺癌治疗的突破普林斯顿化学的张实验室继续其使命，阐明金属营养素在人类生物学中的作用：去年是铁；去年是铁；去年是铁；去年是铁。今年，铜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-copper-detection-tool-may-lead-to-lung-cancer-treatment-breakthrough.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-copper-detection-tool-may-lead-to-lung-cancer-treatment-breakthrough.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26e9b36b-bcd9-46ef-a209-e257cd0d17f0 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:55:13 -0500 New copper detection tool may lead to lung cancer treatment breakthrough
与 HER2 低乳腺癌相关的基因组见解和新治疗范例2025 年 1 月 20 日，Oncotarget 第 16 卷发表了一篇新综述，标题为“HER2 低乳腺癌概念的演变：基因组见解、定义和治疗范例”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Genomic-insights-and-new-treatment-paradigms-lated-to-HER2-low-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Genomic-insights-and-new-treatment-paradigms-lated-to-HER2-low-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56534c3d-f104-48c9-8306-3273b2dcfd46 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:50:01 -0500 Genomic insights and new treatment paradigms related to HER2-low breast cancer
新的气液界面方法增强皮肤类器官中毛囊的形成几十年来，创建具有生理相关性的人体皮肤模型一直是皮肤病学研究中的一个持续挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-air-liquid-interface-method-enhances-hair-follicle-formation-in-skin-organoids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-air-liquid-interface-method-enhances-hair-follicle-formation-in-skin-organoids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=374e7642-64d5-4161-9427-45711ad8b089 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:46:12 -0500 New air-liquid interface method enhances hair follicle formation in skin organoids
特朗普退出世界卫生组织可能会影响较贫穷国家的数百万人分析人士表示，唐纳德·特朗普退出世界卫生组织（WHO）的决定使较贫穷国家数百万人的生命面临风险，他们表示其他国家必须加大对卫生领域的投资来弥补这一差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Trumpe28099s-withdrawal-from-the-WHO-could-millions-of-people-in-poorer-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Trumpe28099s-withdrawal-from-the-WHO-could-millions-of-people-in-poorer-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eefd00b1-3511-4371-a445-fd8cb16472a9 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:43:00 -0500 Trump’s withdrawal from the WHO could millions of people in poorer countries
研究发现美国蚊子传播奥罗普切病毒的风险极小美国蚊子传播奥罗普切病毒（OROV）的能力极低，受检测人群的感染率和传播率较低，这表明尽管输入病例不断增加，但当地爆发疫情的可能性有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/US-mosquito-species-show-minimal-risk-of-spreading-Oropoouche-virus-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/US-mosquito-species-show-minimal-risk-of-spreading-Oropoouche-virus-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f860c5c-cc56-4559-9c79-148de4f658b8 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:41:00 -0500 U.S. mosquito species show minimal risk of spreading Oropouche virus, study finds
参与奖励学习的大脑信号可能是个性化抑郁症治疗的关键在《情感障碍杂志》的一项研究中，弗拉林生物医学研究所的科学家 Pearl Chiu 和 Brooks Casas 研究了奖励学习中涉及的大脑信号如何帮助个性化抑郁症治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Brain-signals-involved-in-reward-learning-may-hold-key-to-personalized-depression-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Brain-signals-involved-in-reward-learning-may-hold-key-to-personalized-depression-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc23744f-ec44-48c7-9a97-57c01b2a57f7 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:35:27 -0500 Brain signals involved in reward learning may hold key to personalized depression treatments
研究确定了治疗疤痕疙瘩的新分子靶点疤痕疙瘩是纤维化疤痕，超出了原始伤口的范围，通常会导致身体毁容和情绪困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-identizes-new-molecular-target-for-treating-keloids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-identizes-new-molecular-target-for-treating-keloids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a508b93d-774b-40ce-a59d-0fb28a0e500b Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:30:10 -0500 Study identifies new molecular target for treating keloids
边缘系统主导的年龄相关 TDP-43 脑病诊断指南发布新的指南将帮助医生识别患有常见记忆丧失综合症的患者，这种综合症在老年人中经常被误诊为阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Diagnostic-guidelines-released-for-limbic-predominant-age-lated-TDP-43-encephalopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Diagnostic-guidelines-released-for-limbic-predominant-age-lated-TDP-43-encephalopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd1e7d90-aa4a-46d5-9b9d-a589f7430d9d Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:27:22 -0500 Diagnostic guidelines released for limbic-predominant age-related TDP-43 encephalopathy
